awd_titl_txt: Workshop on Natural Disasters in European/Mediterranean     Countries
awd_abstract_narration: The Workshop on Natural Disasters in European/Mediterranean                     Countries and the U.S. will take place in Perugia, Italy, on June               27 to July 1st., 1988.  The meeting is sponsored by the National                Science Foundation and the National Research Council of Italy.                  The purpose of the workshop is to provide a forum to exchange                   ideas on scientific progress and on needed research to control                  and mitigate the effects of natural disasters, i.e., floods,                    landslides, earthquakes, droughts, and other land failures, in                  southern Europe and in the U.S.A.  The problems and interests                   that the countries involved have in common will be identified.                  The proceedings of the workshop will be published and their                     recommendations could lead to cooperative activities on these                   important research areas.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
